commentBody:
Belichick doesn't even bother to disguise his contempt for the media anymore. When asked questions about Chandler, he declines to answer and wonders if there are any football-related questions.

When asked about how he plans to use Chandler in the game, Belichick says maybe he should "Xerox you a copy of the game plan, and you can send it over to Kansas City." Perhaps Belichick can offer up a list of pre-approved questions for the media to ask.

It's not just the media; he seems to barely tolerate his coaching peers in pre- and post-game moments. Personally, I'm long since tired of his pompous, superior disdain toward others. Within the game or outside of it, he's a sterling example of how not to behave.
